ActionableEventSubtype.name: ActionableEventSubtype
ActionableEventSubtype.description: Represents the subtype of an external or internal event that's processed by the Actionable Event Orchestration framework to trigger different types of actions.

ActionableEventTypeId.description: The parent event type related to an actionable event subtype.

ApiName.description: The API name of an actionable event sub type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of an event subtype that represents a specific external or internal actionable event.
